properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hoyahe, Hoyahe,
na tufurahi siku ya leo. x2
Alleluya — hoyee tulitukuze
jina la Bwana. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hoyahe, Hoyahe,
na tufurahi siku ya leo.
Alt: na tufurahi siku ya leo,
Tenor: na tufurahi
siku ya leo
All: tulitukuze jina la Bwana.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hoyahe, Hoyahe,
Mungu wetu ndiwe
Baba mfariji. x2
Alleluya — hoyee kazi
zako zote zinakusifu. x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Hoyahe, Hoyahe, Mungu
wetu ndiwe Baba mfariji.
Alt: Mungu wetu ndiwe
Baba mfariji
Tenor: Mungu wetu ndiwe
Baba mfariji
All: kazi zako zote
zinakusifu.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Hoyahe, Hoyahe,
tumshukuru kwa
ajili ya Yesu. x2
Alleluya — hoyee
aliye nasi lake taifa. x2

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Hoyahe, Hoyahe,
tumshukuru kwa
ajili ya Yesu
Alt: tumshukuru kwa
ajili ya Yesu
Tenor: tumshukuru kwa
ajili ya Yesu
All: aliye nasi lake taifa.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Hoyahe, Hoyahe,
tumpe Mungu sifa,
enzi, tukuzo. x2
Alleluya — hoyee
nguvu na heshima
hata milele. x2

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Hoyahe, Hoyahe,
tumpe Mungu sifa,
enzi, tukuzo
Alt: tumpe Mungu sifa,
enzi, tukuzo
Tenor: tumpe Mungu sifa,
enzi, tukuzo
All: nguvu na heshima
hata milele.
